ygData.subject: Re: Taxis
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a 36 Wizzy on the Xegony server and from experience I can say that Dreadlands is a fairly safe teleport. In the half dozen or so times I have teleported
ygData.messageBody:
I am a 36 Wizzy on the Xegony server and from
experience I can say that Dreadlands is a fairly safe
teleport. In the half dozen or so times I have teleported
there I have yet to even see an enemy, plus there are
normally people standing around that keep the area clear
of wandering beasts. On the other hand, when you
teleport to Cazic there is a good chance you will be
attacked upon arrival, and I am told the same holds true
for Iceclad. I have teleported 3 times to Iceclad and
one time saw an enemy, so I don't know really how
safe it is.<br><br>As far as fees go, I teleport for
donations and have received as little as nothing for corpse
retrivals up to 100pp, so I feel donations work really
well. I probably average about 25pp per
shot.<br><br>Safe Journeys my friends and look me up if you are on
the Xegony server.<br><br>Wizzkid, 36th year<br>Grim
Realm Warriors Guild
